<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/0876c78527469ddf50c23244566dd5bc35004307|patch 8.2.1812: Vim9: nested closure throws an internal error>
patch 8.2.1812: Vim9: nested closure throws an internal error

Problem:    Vim9: nested closure throws an internal error.
Solution:   Do not skip a local variable with a partial. (closes #7065)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1812: Vim9: nested closure throws an internal error · vim/vim@0876c78

attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: nested closure throws an internal error. Solution: Do not skip a local variable with a partial. (closes #7065)

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/9a033d7b18651acbb7eda4b7f39a27c01748fb70|patch 8.2.1811: mapping Ctrl-key does not work for '{', '}' and '|'>
patch 8.2.1811: mapping Ctrl-key does not work for '{', '}' and '|'

Problem:    Mapping Ctrl-key does not work for '{', '}' and '|'.
Solution:   Remove the shift modifier. (closes #6457)

attachments.text: Problem: Mapping Ctrl-key does not work for '{', '}' and '|'. Solution: Remove the shift modifier. (closes #6457)
